title: Correction to: Rationale and design of two randomized sham‑controlled of catheter‑based renal denervation in subjects with uncontrolled hypertension in the absence (SPYRAL HTN‑OFF MED Pivotal) and presence (SPYRAL HTN‑ON MED Expansion) of antihypertensive medications: a novel approach using Bayesian design
